page.title: 01Around Trusley & Dalbury
page.content: This area is completely rural and given to{agriculture.}There are two small{hamlets}and several farms.The whole area gives the impression of being prosperous. The area is well treed with mature specimens of{oak, ash, chestnut}and {beech}along the hedges.Also there are one or two small{plantations}giving cover for game birds. The land tends to be heavy and is very muddy in winter, making the lanes dirty. The lanes are in good condition and give good access to the area. There is no{public transport}at all.
